name: Competitive Programming Debugger
description: Visual debugging suite for competitive programming with realtime variable tracing, animated graph renderings, and multi-view timeline playback.

name: Fractal Visualizer in Zp Space
description: Portable fractal visualizer for prime fields featuring modular arithmetic overlays, and live parameter scrubbing.

name: Terreria
description: 2D sandbox adventure inspired by Terraria with custom physics, OpenGL shaders, and procedurally serialized worlds.

name: Track-Pad
description: Gesture-driven desktop controller that turns hand tracking into cursor, scrolling, volume, and media controls.
